sentence.Network_en: It's a devastating and barbaric act that defies all comprehension.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种行为野蛮凶残、令人震惊，简直是不可理喻。

sentence.Network_en: The course also features creative writing exercises and listening comprehension.
sentence.Network_cn: 这门课程也包括写作练习和听力理解。

sentence.Network_en: What Jock had done was beyond my comprehension.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无法理解乔克的所作所为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French compréhension or Latin comprehensio(n-), from the verb comprehendere 'seize, comprise' (see comprehend)

entry.def: Comprehension is the ability to understand something.

example.ex: This was utterly beyond her comprehension.

entry.def: Comprehension is full knowledge and understanding of the meaning of something.

example.ex: They turned to one another with the same expression of dawning comprehension, surprise, and relief.
example.tran: 他们相互看了看，脸上都是同一种表情，恍然大悟、惊讶，而又如释重负。

entry.def: When pupils do comprehension, they do an exercise to find out how well they understand a piece of spoken or written language.

example.ex: The course also features creative writing exercises and listening comprehension.
example.tran: 这门课程也包括写作练习和听力理解。

means.word_mean: 1. an ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result);

sentences.sentence: "how you can do that is beyond my comprehension"
"he was famous for his comprehension of American literature"
"he admired the inclusion of so many ideas in such a short work"

auth_sentence.content: I am disappointed with YOUR reading comprehension skills!

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+prehens抓住+ible能……的→能够抓住的→能理解的
com全部+prehens抓住+ible能……的→全部能抓住的

stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+prehens抓住+ive……的→全部抓住的→总括性的,综合的
ap加强+prehens抓住+ion表名词→n.理解;焦虑,担忧;逮捕
com全部+prehens抓住+ion表名词→全部抓住→理解

sentences.en: The teacher set the class a comprehension test.
sentences.cn: 老师对全班同学进行了一次理解力测验。

jushi.english: Many courses have as a primary objective the development of aural comprehension and speaking ability.
jushi.chinese: 许多课程都把听说能力的培养作为其主要目标。

jushi.english: The teacher set the class a comprehension test.
jushi.chinese: 老师对全班同学进行了一次理解力测验。

jushi.english: How he managed it is beyond my comprehension.
jushi.chinese: 他是怎么应付的,我真不明白。
